divs: Sighting DetailsUFO Report Winter 1997 I was in the cow fields of Nevada in Winter 1997. I was with some people who took me there. Next I hear a whistleing sound and a group of lights from the sky. It was fast and it happened that I fainted. I think it was a UFO. I saw that something like a vortex came from the stars and I could see what appeared to be the stars and everything around it like a drop of water bouncing off more water, it looked like a chandelier. I was so amazed. I have always had so much respect for the intergalactic and the planet Mars. And I know so much about these things. I love the Universe and it amazes me this happened to me. I will never forget about the Universe. I saw it come at me and then I forgot. Maybe I fainted for a good reason. Maybe the Universe is not as big as it looks.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around January 7th 1997
Summary: This might have been an abduction.
